remarks: A locally finite cover in a coarser topology is locally finite in a finer topology.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
locfincf.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
locfincf $p |- ( ( K e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ J C_ K ) -> ( LocFin ` J ) C_ ( LocFin ` K ) ) $.
